description: Try our easy to follow Berry Frappe recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Berry Frappe Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place 1 cup frozen raspberries, 1 cup frozen strawberries, 11/2 cups chilled apple and blackcurrant juice, 1/2 cup Greek-style natural yoghurt, honey to taste and 4 ice cubes into a blender. Blend until mixture is smooth and frothy. Crush another 8 ice cubes and spoon into glasses. Pour frappe over. Serve immediately.
